title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/cammy-jake.html
notes:
THE HITMAN

01 July 2009


ATTN. 
LISTEN VERY CAREFULLY ,THIS IS THE ONLY WAY I CAN CONTACT YOU, my TEAM HAS BEEN PAID TO ASSASINATE YOU, I HAVE EVERY REASON TO CARRY OUT THE CONTRACT,BUT I DECIDED TO GIVE YOU A CHANCE AND SAVE YOUR FAMILY THIS PAIN,THIS YOUR ALTERNATIVE,I WISH TO HELP YOU UNLESS YOU DONT WANT TO HELP YOUR SELF,I WILL SEND YOU ENOUGH EVIDENCE YOU NEED ON A VIDEO TAPE RECORD TO NAIL MY EMPLOYER DOWN WITH THE LAW. 
BEFORE THAT YOUR REQUIRED TO MAKE AVAILABLE THE SUM OF $100,000. USD AFTER WHICH I WILL DIRECT YOU ON WHAT TO DO NEXT TO SAVE YOUR SELF AND YOUR FAMILY FROM THIS PAIN THAT WOULD HAVE BEFALLED YOU FROM MY EMPLOYER,THE MONEY WILL BE USED TO SETTLE THE TEAM MEN INVOLVED TO GO BACK TO THERE DESTINATIONS AND YOU BETTER KEEP THIS INFORMATION TO YOUR SELF BECAUSE YOU DONT KNOW WHO IS WHO WHERE YOU ARE NOW,IF HE FINDS OUT I HAVE BETRAYED HIM TRYING TO HELP YOU,YOU WILL HAVE YOUR 
SELF TO BLAME, I HAVE ORDERED MY MEN TO SATY AWAY FROM YOU. 
DO WE HAVE A DEAL OR NOT ? 
NOTE: YOU HAVE TWO OPTIONS HERE, (1)YOU HAVE TO GET HIM ARRESTED WITH THE INFORMATION I WILL GIVE YOU AFTER THE PAYMENT OR ( 2)YOU HAVE HIM KILLED TO SAVE YOUR SELF. 
I WILL VISIT YOUR HOUSE AGAIN BUT NOT NOW,MY BOYS EYES ARE ON YOU SO GET BACK TO ME AS SOON AS POSSIBLE

messages.body:
Brett, 
This is so not funny - for fuck's sake stop playing Hitman, and stop thinking we'll ever be together again. 
It's over, and I hate what we did! 
Cammy
messages.raw:
Camille White

Brett, This is so not funny - for fuck's sake stop playing Hitman, and stop thinking we'll ever be together again. It's over, and I hate what we did! Cammy

[But then the Lad bowls me a googly (or sends down a curve ball, depending on whether you play cricket or baseball).]

messages.body:
Thursday, 2 July, 2009, 9:56 AM


Hello. 
please be carefull and pay no money to anybody, i am aware somebody is threatening to kill you, that is a clear lies and scam, am cleaner by profession and a poor young man,i believe things will change for me one day, i came to read about michael jackson"s death in the internet business centre, and i saw an opened notepad,i saw about more than 39 different email address with a threat 
later and killing words below it,in which your email is included, believe me ,no body wants you dead, the person that did this is a scammer,i have informed others, ok ? he/she must have made the graetest mistake to forget closing the note pad well, please do not be afraid again and be as happy as you used to be before, feel free and go  
any were you want, ok?,do not listen to any word he says to you, let him know you have found out he is no body.  
take care of your self and your family and reply back to me.  
be my good friend.  
bye

Jake

messages.body:
Hello Jake, 
You've got me curious now. Where are you? I also hope that maggot scammer won't find out what you did! I haven't heard from him since, so maybe he knows someone's blabbed. Maybe you should keep your head down! 
Since you helped me, here's something on account - a picture from a photoshoot last year on Bondi Beach. It's AJ's favourite. 
Please let me know that you're OK. 
And call me Cammy - all my friends do. 
Cammy

Camille White

messages.body:
Jake, 
I really want to know more about you. 
Someone who saves you (and others) from being ripped off deserves something special and sending it to a name alone isn't the same. Please send me a picture of yourself and what you do, what you like and dislike, that sort of thing. 
I feel in my heart that Freyja would bless us for that, and I follow what She puts in my heart. 
Love, 
Cammy

Camille White

messages.body:
Jake, 
For now I don't care if you're poor - what's important is that you have a good heart (although it's a bonus if you're good looking - Freyja looks most kindly on those who are beautiful). 
I'm going to raise my spirit before Freyja tonight as it's Her sacred day today and seek Her blessing upon us. It would really help if I had a picture of you as I need a clear image in my mind for Her blessing. But She is understanding, and I hope She will smile upon you. 
I'm going on a photoshoot over the weekend - I'll be thinking of you. 
Cammy.

messages.body:
Jake,
I've met people with "little domestic problems" - and they weren't quite telling me the truth. Without truth there's no trust and no relationship can survive without trust. You have to tell me exactly what the problems are, and don't hold back.
And send me that picture before tomorrow. When I raise my spirit to Freyja, I want Her to see you as you truly are.
Cammy

[He's going to tell me, even if I have to think up something horrible...]

messages.body:
Jake,
When someone asks for money and won't say exactly what it's for, I remember the times when I've lent people money for the wrong reasons. I've had a flatmate ask for a loan and it turned out she was buying drugs. I've known people who just gambled it all away, or worse.
Back when I was 17, I fell in with Robbo, ten years older and good company - so I thought. Told me how great we were together and how he loved me. But seems he got ill, and I had to tide him over. Turns out the medicine he was taking came in shot glasses, and the rest of my money went into the pokies. 
It ended when Robbo got shitty after I found out he was gambling my money away. We had a fight in my flat. He smacked me around and emptied my purse and was just walking out when my brother Roscoe, on leave, walked up to the front door. 
Roscoe took one look at me standing there with a blood nose and black eye, and then somehow he broke both Robbo's wrists - some SAS trick he said. He kicked Robbo into the street and I never saw that loser again.
Until you tell me exactly what your problem is, then I'm not ready to send you any money. It's as simple as that.
Cammy
messages.raw:
Camille White

Back when I was 17, I fell in with Robbo, ten years older and good company - so I thought. Told me how great we were together and how he loved me. But seems he got ill, and I had to tide him over. Turns out the medicine he was taking came in shot glasses, and the rest of my money went into the pokies.
It ended when Robbo got shitty after I found out he was gambling my money away. We had a fight in my flat. He smacked me around and emptied my purse and was just walking out when my brother Roscoe, on leave, walked up to the front door.
Roscoe took one look at me standing there with a blood nose and black eye, and then somehow he broke both Robbo's wrists - some SAS trick he said. He kicked Robbo into the street and I never saw that loser again.
Until you tell me exactly what your problem is, then I'm not ready to send you any money. It's as simple as that.
Cammy

Jake,
What the fuck is wrong with you? By Hel's frozen teeth - if my mum was still alive and very sick, and needed help, I wouldn't feel any shame about asking for that help! 
Maybe it's a cultural thing; I just don't understand it when you can't come clean about your mum being sick.
Cammy

its me jake,as you are reading this message,there is tears in my eyes and i hate my self for not being carefull, i am now contacting you with my new email address, the thiefs in the internet business house i used to email you has hacked my email box and stole the money you sent to me, those email you recieved that has the word (ashawo) meaning harlot, the email is not from me, the hacked my box and had access to my email box and emailed you all those words, asking you to send more money, please donot email me to that email box again ,am now using this box am emailing you with now.
i appriciate the your effort and the love you showed by sending thatmoney they stole from me, i told my mother every thing and explained to her, she sends her greetings to you with tears in her eyes too.
please forgive me carelessness, am a fool and i deserve to be called any bad name, please forgive me camille. i await your reply

messages.body:
Jake,
Sending that money just about wiped me out. Until we get our agency cheques (and I can't predict when that'll be) I'm about done. Why did your Wyrd treat you like this?
Cammy

messages.body:
Jake,
Just let's both take a chill pill. This asshole's not a real hitman so he won't be hunting you down - you don't have to go on the run. He's just some dip-dick can't cunt no-load geek asshole (sorry for the language but I picked that one up from my brother). I shouldn't have panicked. I hope all this didn't harm your mother - you should get her back to the hospital.I'll do what I can when I can. I'd be insulting you if I sent pocket change and I wouldn't do that.
Just hang in there.
Cammy

messages.body:
Jake,
That's good news. You deserve so much better than what those fuckers did... I can get over what I lost; but it's just wrong what they did.
Things aren't looking too flash for me at the moment, but my networking has paid off. A couple of my friends from overseas are really keen to help. I'm going to give them your address and then all should be shiny. Any chance you could get your mum to write to me? I'd like that - I don't even remember mine; I was so young when she died.
Cammy
